name: zuus_rival_03
text: Keep in mind, Chen, Godliness is next to deadliness.
text_simple: keep in mind chen godliness is next to deadliness

name: zuus_rival_05
text: These so-called gods of yours are unknown to me. You should introduce us.
text_simple: these socalled gods of yours are unknown to me you should introduce us

name: zuus_rival_06
text: I'll be having a few words with Poseidon about your behavior.
text_simple: ill be having a few words with poseidon about your behavior

name: zuus_rival_07
text: Our long irrational nightmare is over.
text_simple: our long irrational nightmare is over

name: zuus_rival_08
text: I have no quarrel with you, Anti-Mage, other than you hating everything I represent.
text_simple: i have no quarrel with you antimage other than you hating everything i represent

name: zuus_rival_09
text: Ah, let's dig a pit and roast this boar. The gods do love a barbecue.
text_simple: ah lets dig a pit and roast this boar the gods do love a barbecue

name: zuus_rival_10
text: Money grubbing Alchemist, I gave you that one free of charge.
text_simple: money grubbing alchemist i gave you that one free of charge

name: zuus_rival_11
text: Clinkz, you cannot hide from the eye in the sky.
text_simple: clinkz you cannot hide from the eye in the sky

name: zuus_rival_12
text: I spy with my little eye, Bounty Hunter.
text_simple: i spy with my little eye bounty hunter

name: zuus_rival_13
text: Did you think you could hide from a god?
text_simple: did you think you could hide from a god

name: zuus_rival_14
text: Ha ha ha, I should have put you to work weaving fabric for my toga.
text_simple: ha ha ha i should have put you to work weaving fabric for my toga

name: zuus_rival_15
text: Ha ha ha, you cannot silence the voice of thunder.
text_simple: ha ha ha you cannot silence the voice of thunder

name: zuus_rival_16
text: She dared to tell the future of a god.
text_simple: she dared to tell the future of a god

name: zuus_rival_17
text: Right or wrong, I'm all divine.
text_simple: right or wrong im all divine

name: zuus_rival_18
text: Who let that pompous ass in here?
text_simple: who let that pompous ass in here

name: zuus_rival_19
text: His head was so big I'm surprised it fit through the gates of death.
text_simple: his head was so big im surprised it fit through the gates of death

name: zuus_rival_20
text: If there's anything I can't abide, it's an egomaniac.
text_simple: if theres anything i cant abide its an egomaniac

name: zuus_rival_21
text: Invoker, let me tell you a little story about my friend Narcissus.
text_simple: invoker let me tell you a little story about my friend narcissus

name: zuus_rival_22
text: There was no profit in lecturing that dullard on the finer points of theosophy!
text_simple: there was no profit in lecturing that dullard on the finer points of theosophy

name: zuus_death_04
text: For this I gave up immortality?
text_simple: for this i gave up immortality

name: zuus_death_06
text: Gods, old friends, go easy on me.
text_simple: gods old friends go easy on me

name: zuus_death_08
text: Go easy, worms. I'm your god too!
text_simple: go easy worms im your god too

name: zuus_death_09
text: Oh hu hu hu...Oh Tragic Day!
text_simple: oh hu hu hu oh tragic day

name: zuus_fastres_01
text: Ha ha ha! I don't take mortality lying down.
text_simple: ha ha ha i dont take mortality lying down

name: zuus_respawn_01
text: Ha ha ha ha ha! Watch out, mortals, Zeus is back!
text_simple: ha ha ha ha ha watch out mortals zeus is back

name: zuus_respawn_02
text: I had best not make a habit of this.
text_simple: i had best not make a habit of this

name: zuus_respawn_03
text: So this is mortality. I really ought to do something about it.
text_simple: so this is mortality i really ought to do something about it

name: zuus_respawn_04
text: A new age dawns: I return!
text_simple: a new age dawns i return

name: zuus_respawn_06
text: God's gift to the world: Me.
text_simple: gods gift to the world me

name: zuus_respawn_07
text: To err is human. To respawn, divine.
text_simple: to err is human to respawn divine

name: zuus_respawn_08
text: Ha ha ha ha ha! Almighty then!
text_simple: ha ha ha ha ha almighty then

name: zuus_respawn_10
text: The wait is over. I am here.
text_simple: the wait is over i am here

name: zuus_lasthit_04
text: Ha ha ha ha...For God's sake!
text_simple: ha ha ha ha for gods sake

name: zuus_lasthit_05
pretty_criteria: Recieving an ultra rare cosmetic item

name: zuus_rare_01
text: Don't take it badly if I look down on you. From where I sit, you all look like tiny insects.
text_simple: dont take it badly if i look down on you from where i sit you all look like tiny insects

name: zuus_rare_02
text: Immortality was overrated. This is much more interesting.
text_simple: immortality was overrated this is much more interesting

name: zuus_rare_03
text: Those who attract the attention of the gods, are made insane.
text_simple: those who attract the attention of the gods are made insane

name: zuus_rare_04
text: If I didn't exist, it would be necessary to invent me.
text_simple: if i didnt exist it would be necessary to invent me

name: zuus_purch_01
text: What, I'm expected to pay for these items?
text_simple: what im expected to pay for these items

name: zuus_purch_02
text: In my old position, such items were perks.
text_simple: in my old position such items were perks

name: zuus_purch_03
text: As a professional, I believe this is a write-off.
text_simple: as a professional i believe this is a writeoff

name: zuus_scepter_02
text: Lucky scepter, to know the touch of a god.
text_simple: lucky scepter to know the touch of a god

name: zuus_blink_02
text: I have high hopes for you, Blink Dagger.
text_simple: i have high hopes for you blink dagger

name: zuus_item_03
text: Ha ha ha! Veil of Discord.
text_simple: ha ha ha veil of discord

name: zuus_bottle_01
text: I don't see any wine, so this will have to do.
text_simple: i dont see any wine so this will have to do

name: zuus_haste_02
text: Haste is not to be wasted.
text_simple: haste is not to be wasted

name: zuus_laugh_03
criteria: Kill Iszuus|Powerup Iszuus IsPowerupArcane|Emote Iszuus IsEmoteLaugh
pretty_criteria: Killing a hero|Activating an arcane rune|Laughing

name: zuus_doubdam_02
text: Hard to believe I could hit any harder.
text_simple: hard to believe i could hit any harder

name: zuus_regen_02
text: The regenerative powers course through me.
text_simple: the regenerative powers course through me

name: zuus_thanks_01
text: Ha ha, god be with you.
text_simple: ha ha god be with you

text: He he he he he. It's in the bag!

name: zuus_arc_rival_17
text: Right or wrong, I'm all divine.
text_simple: right or wrong im all divine

name: zuus_arc_rival_18
text: Who let that pompous ass in here?
text_simple: who let that pompous ass in here

name: zuus_arc_rival_19
text: His head was so big I'm surprised it fit through the gates of death.
text_simple: his head was so big im surprised it fit through the gates of death

name: zuus_arc_rival_20
text: If there's anything I can't abide, it's an egomaniac.
text_simple: if theres anything i cant abide its an egomaniac

name: zuus_arc_rival_21
text: Invoker, let me tell you a little story about my friend Narcissus.
text_simple: invoker let me tell you a little story about my friend narcissus

name: zuus_arc_rival_22
text: There was no profit in lecturing that dullard on the finer points of theosophy!
text_simple: there was no profit in lecturing that dullard on the finer points of theosophy

name: zuus_arc_death_04
text: For this I gave up immortality?
text_simple: for this i gave up immortality

name: zuus_arc_death_06
text: Gods, old friends, go easy on me.
text_simple: gods old friends go easy on me

name: zuus_arc_death_08
text: Go easy, worms. I'm your god too!
text_simple: go easy worms im your god too

name: zuus_arc_death_09
text: Oh hu hu hu...Oh Tragic Day!
text_simple: oh hu hu hu oh tragic day

name: zuus_arc_fastres_01
text: Ha ha ha! I don't take mortality lying down.
text_simple: ha ha ha i dont take mortality lying down

name: zuus_arc_respawn_01
text: Ha ha ha ha ha! Watch out, mortals, Zeus is back!
text_simple: ha ha ha ha ha watch out mortals zeus is back

name: zuus_arc_respawn_02
text: I had best not make a habit of this.
text_simple: i had best not make a habit of this

name: zuus_arc_respawn_03
text: So this is mortality. I really ought to do something about it.
text_simple: so this is mortality i really ought to do something about it

name: zuus_arc_respawn_04
text: A new age dawns: I return!
text_simple: a new age dawns i return

name: zuus_arc_respawn_06
text: God's gift to the world: Me.
text_simple: gods gift to the world me

name: zuus_arc_respawn_07
text: To err is human. To respawn, divine.
text_simple: to err is human to respawn divine

name: zuus_arc_respawn_08
text: Ha ha ha ha ha! Almighty then!
text_simple: ha ha ha ha ha almighty then

name: zuus_arc_respawn_10
text: The wait is over. I am here.
text_simple: the wait is over i am here

name: zuus_arc_lasthit_03
criteria: LastHit Iszuus IsZeusEconArcana|Powerup Iszuus IsZeusEconArcana IsPowerupBounty

name: zuus_arc_lasthit_04
text: Ha ha ha ha...For God's sake!

name: zuus_arc_lasthit_05
pretty_criteria: Recieving an ultra rare cosmetic item

name: zuus_arc_rare_01
text: Don't take it badly if I look down on you. From where I sit, you all look like tiny insects.
text_simple: dont take it badly if i look down on you from where i sit you all look like tiny insects

name: zuus_arc_rare_02
text: Immortality was overrated. This is much more interesting.
text_simple: immortality was overrated this is much more interesting

name: zuus_arc_rare_03
text: Those who attract the attention of the gods, are made insane.
text_simple: those who attract the attention of the gods are made insane

name: zuus_arc_rare_04
text: If I didn't exist, it would be necessary to invent me.
text_simple: if i didnt exist it would be necessary to invent me

name: zuus_arc_purch_01
text: What, I'm expected to pay for these items?
text_simple: what im expected to pay for these items

name: zuus_arc_purch_02
text: In my old position, such items were perks.
text_simple: in my old position such items were perks

name: zuus_arc_purch_03
text: As a professional, I believe this is a write-off.
text_simple: as a professional i believe this is a writeoff

name: zuus_arc_scepter_02
text: Lucky scepter, to know the touch of a god.

text: I have high hopes for you, Blink Dagger.
